Description:
The FHIR Observation resource defines measurements and assertions about a patient, including vital signs, laboratory data, imaging results, devices measurements, clinical assessment tools, personal characteristics, social history, and core characteristics.

Obstetric information is categorized under social history.

category.Name: category
category.Description: Use "social-history" to search for smoking history and OB/Gyn details.
category.Optional: Either this or code must be provided, not both.

code.Name: code
code.Description: The LOINC code of the observation.
code.Optional: Either this or category must be provided, but not both.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Reference to a patient resource. If both patient and subject are provided, they must match.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry in the resource bundle.

outcome.Name: outcome
outcome.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

code.Name: code
code.Description:
The LOINC Code of the Observation.

Observation Type LOINC Code
Pregnancy Status 82810-3
Lactation Status "Lactation Status"
Smoking History 72166-2
Physical Findings of Uterus 32486-3

valueBoolean.Name: valueBoolean
valueBoolean.Description: Yes/No answer to whether the patient has a uterus.
valueBoolean.Optional: Used for Physical Findings of Uterus.

valueCodeableConcept.Name: valueCodeableConcept
valueCodeableConcept.Description:
The SNOMED code indicating whether the observation is present:
  • Yes (373066001)
  • No (373067005)
  • Unknown (261665006)
valueCodeableConcept.Optional: Used for Lactation Status and Pregnancy Status.
